pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal is a placable block that can be found atop each obsidian pillar on the central island of the End.

$(li)This block creates a big explosion when is broken, inflicting a lot of damage in a near area.$(br)$(li)Their primary function is to regenerate the health of the $(l)Ender Dragon$().$(br)$(li)You can place four of these blocks on the $(l:patchouli:structures/end_fountain)End Fountain$(/l) to respawn the $(l)Ender Dragon$().
